description:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 is now available in three variants (64GB/3GB RAM, 64GB/4GB RAM, 128GB/4GB RAM, 128GB/6GB RAM). Now, Xiaomi Redmi Note 9’s Price is 18,999 BDT in Bangladesh. Redmi Note 9 has a 5020mAh battery with 18W fast charging. This device is running with Android 10 and powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 chipset.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 highlight

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 will be launched on 1st December 2020. The Redmi Note 9 launched with model number M2003J15SC, M2003J15SG, M2003J15SS. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 162.3 x 77.2 x 8.9 mm and the weight is 199 grams. Secondly, the display of Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 is a 6.53-inch IPS LCD panel with 1080 x 2340 pixels resolution. The display is protecting with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 and running with Android 10. Moreover, it has up to (2×2.0 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 48MP wide, 8MP ultrawide, 2MP macro, and 2MP depth camera. It has a 13MP selfie camera inside the punch hole of the display. The video recording capability is 2160p@30fps, 1080p@30/60/120fps, 720p@960fps, gyro-EIS. According to its RAM and ROM, It has three (3GB/64GB,4GB/128GB,6GB/128GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC on a dedicated slot. Certainly, Redmi Note 9 has a 5020mAh battery with 18-watt fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Redmi Note 9 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is rear-mounted.

On the other hand, among the other features, there are WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, USB port and Face unlock.

Your question and our opinion about Redmi Note 9

Which question you will have about this phone. Let’s justify these. There we are including the major question and answers about this phone. So, let’s start now.

When it will released?

It will launch on 12 May, 2020

What is the price of Redmi Note 9?

The price of Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 is BDT 18,999.

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has three variants 3GB/4GB/6GB in RAM & two variants 64GB/128GB in ROM. But ,overall you can get 3 variants (3GB/64GB, 4GB/64GB, 4GB/128GB, 6GB/128GB) in market

Which type of display panel used in it?

It comes with a 6.53″ IPS LCD Display panel with 1080 x 2340 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains MediaTek Helio G85 Chipset and Android 10. It has up to (2×2.0 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU.

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The triple camera setup on back 48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP and a 13MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps.

Dose it is support 5G network?

No, It is support 4G network with 2G / 3G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is 5020mAh Li-Polymer battery with 18W fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass .

Which country and company manufactured it?

Xiaomi manufactured it and this phone is made in China.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Redmi Note 9.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 4G smartphone under 19K Taka. Then Redmi Note 9 will in the first row among the best smartphones. Dear friends if you have an attraction to online games like Free Fire, PUBG MOBILE, and so on then you can buy it. Because it has RAM and a well Processor using the MediaTek Helio G85 chipset. If you want a big back up on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 5020mAh battery. In addition, it’s a 4G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. However, it has a quad-cam setup with a 48MP primary camera. So, it’s the image and video capability may be well. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.
